programme.title: The Witch

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther

programme.title: Get Shorty

programme.title: Fargo

programme.title: Cedar Rapids

programme.title: Over Her Dead Body
programme.desc: A jealous ghost (Eva Longoria Parker), who died on her wedding day, tries to sabotage her groom's (Paul Rudd) new romance with a psychic (Lake Bell).

programme.title: Some Kind of Beautiful
programme.desc: A woman starts to fall in love with a successful college professor who had a baby with her younger sister.

programme.title: The End of the Tour

programme.title: Locke

programme.title: Locke

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Hired to tame a rowdy Missouri bar, a Ph.D. bouncer (Patrick Swayze) romances a doctor (Kelly Lynch) and tames the whole town.

programme.title: The Company You Keep
programme.desc: After a reporter (Shia LaBeouf) uncovers his real identity, a former Weather Underground activist (Robert Redford) goes on the run to track down his former lover (Julie Christie), a fellow member of his cell who never gave up the fight.

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: While Sonny sets his eye on a second property, new arrivals, a lack of space and the demands of a traditional Indian wedding threaten to engulf Evelyn, Douglas, Muriel and the others.

programme.title: Woman Walks Ahead
programme.desc: A headstrong New York painter embarks on a dangerous journey to meet Sitting Bull but must face off with an Army officer intent on war with the Native Americans.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: A liberal-minded couple are forced to reconsider their image of their adopted son after he writes a disturbing essay for a class assignment.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: Worlds collide when Enn, a shy teenager in 1970s London, meets the beautiful and rebellious Zan at a party. They set in motion the ultimate showdown between their rivaling worlds and test the limits of how far they will go for true love.

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: An airport security agent (Jay Baruchel) must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman (Alice Eve) falls in love with him.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral
programme.desc: The grown children of an overbearing Chinese matriarch reluctantly gather to take part in seven days' worth of traditional funeral rites.

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Following in his father's (Chevy Chase) footsteps, Rusty Griswold (Ed Helms) takes his wife (Christina Applegate) and two sons on a cross-country road trip to America's favorite fun park, Walley World.

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: After a sideshow vampire (John C. Reilly) turns a teenager into one of the undead, the kid becomes a pawn between warring supernatural factions.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Horrifying events turn panic to real terror when a young woman (Elizabeth Olsen) becomes trapped in the old house she's helping her father and uncle renovate.

programme.title: A Prayer Before Dawn
programme.desc: The amazing true story of Billy Moore, an English boxer incarcerated in Thailand's most notorious prison. Thrown into a world of drugs and violence, he finds his best chance to escape is to fight his way out in Muay Thai tournaments.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer (Tobey Maguire) and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) enthrall the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: Caught in a panic over her boyfriend's marriage proposal, Megan pretends to go on a business trip but, in reality, hangs out with a teenage friend, Annika.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) grows suspicious of her controlling husband (Joseph Fiennes) after she discovers secrets about the women in his past.

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: The prison-bound manager (Will Ferrell) of a hedge fund asks a black businessman (Kevin Hart) -- who has never been to jail -- to prepare him for life behind bars.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: A government agent (Samuel L. Jackson) recruits an athlete (Vin Diesel) to stop an anarchist from using biological and chemical weapons.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A couple (James Brolin, Margot Kidder) battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: In 1988, N.W.A (O'Shea Jackson Jr., Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell) revolutionizes music and pop culture with their brutally honest depiction of life in Southern Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his team face an underworld prince who plans to awaken a lethal army and use it to reclaim Earth for his magical kindred.

programme.title: Cyrus
programme.desc: A downtrodden divorced man (John C. Reilly) becomes locked in a battle of wills with his new lover's possessive son (Jonah Hill).

programme.title: Observe and Report
programme.desc: A mall security officer (Seth Rogen) tries to impress his dream girl and prove his worthiness for a coveted spot at the police academy by collaring a flasher.

programme.title: Slice
programme.desc: In a spooky small town, when a slew of pizza delivery boys are slain on the job, two daring survivors set out to catch the culprits behind the cryptic crime spree.

programme.title: Freedomland
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) investigates a carjacking that resulted in the abduction of the young son of a troubled woman (Julianne Moore).

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: When members of a dance troupe are lured to an empty school, drug-laced sangria causes their jubilant rehearsal to descend into a dark and explosive nightmare as they try to survive the night -- and find out who's responsible -- before it's too late.

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: In 1962 London, the lifelong friendship between two teenagers (Elle Fanning, Alice Englert) dissolves after one seduces the other's father.

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: In 1962 London, the lifelong friendship between two teenagers (Elle Fanning, Alice Englert) dissolves after one seduces the other's father.

programme.title: Lean on Pete
programme.desc: Charley, a teen living with his single father, finds work caring for an aging racehorse named Lean on Pete. When he learns Pete is bound for slaughter, the two embark on an odyssey across the new American frontier in search of a place to call home.

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Guided by a rebellious and charismatic coach (Hugh Jackman), British ski jumper Michael

programme.title: The Upside of Anger
programme.desc: An ex-ballplayer (Kevin Costner) befriends a mother (Joan Allen) of four who has hovered in a boozy funk since her husband abandoned her.

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: When a school's goody-two-shoes (Reese Witherspoon) runs for class president, a teacher/adviser (Matthew Broderick) schemes to keep her from winning.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Nia (Kristen Stewart) and Silas (Nicholas Hoult) begin a forbidden and passionate romance in a futuristic society where emotions have been outlawed, leading them to attempt a dangerous escape.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: A troubled Gulf War veteran (Denzel Washington) becomes suspicious after a powerful senator's (Meryl Streep) son (Liev Schreiber) becomes a candidate for vice president.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Psychic Elise Rainier (Lin Shaye) reluctantly agrees to use her ability to converse with the dead to help a teenage girl (Stefanie Scott) who is being tormented by a dangerous supernatural entity.

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: A grieving mother (Sarah Wayne Callies) upsets the balance between life and death when she opens an ancient door that releases the restless spirit of her deceased son (Logan Creran).

programme.title: You're Next
programme.desc: Members of an estranged, upper-class family must pull together to repel home invaders who are disguised in animal masks and trying to kill them.

programme.title: The Foot Fist Way
programme.desc: After discovering his wife's infidelity, a bombastic but hopelessly inept martial artist (Danny R. McBride) sets out on a quest to meet his idol (Ben Best).

programme.title: Never Goin' Back
programme.desc: Angela and Jessie are best friends intent on taking a wild beach trip, but when their roommate loses all of their money in a drug scam, the girls -- blissfully stoned -- go to increasingly daring and absurd lengths to get it back.

programme.title: Yes Man
programme.desc: After attending a self-help seminar, a negative-thinking man (Jim Carrey) brings about an amazing change in his life by saying yes to everything.

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: A 1920s football star (George Clooney) tries to give his sagging sport a boost, while he and a new teammate (John Krasinski) vie for the affections of a feisty newswoman (Renée Zellweger).

programme.title: Philomena
programme.desc: Journalist Martin Sixsmith (Steve Coogan) helps Philomena Lee (Judi Dench) search for her long-lost son, who was taken from her by nuns in an Irish convent and sold into adoption when she was an unwed teenager.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: The guys flip things upside down to find out how much power might be left in the oil pan; a number of factors play a part in minimizing turbulence around the crank, but an $1,100 solution may not be worth the cost.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: The guys try to shed light on whether iron or aluminum heads will deliver more power; they'll look at weight savings and heat retention's effect on cylinder pressure.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Gary Hopper, a longtime friend of Joe, brings a '55 Chevy Bel Air to the shop; because this '55 has sentimental value to Gary's family, the pressure is on to do this build right; but missing pieces and a dented hood throw a wrench into the job.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis take on a Porsche 911 in rough shape: it turns up in pieces on a trailer. If they can revive it, they'll take it on an epic drive through the Cairngorms.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: A twist of fate reunites a man with a Dodge Li'l Red Express he once bought from his boss at a local pizza joint.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: A 1965 Chevy C10 was the perfect father-son project until the father tragically lost his son; the truck has sat in the garage ever since, and now the Squad steps in to help turn a place of sadness into one of renewed joy.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: The Squad help update a man's 1971 Chevy Blazer after he neglected it to support his family during a tragic loss.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: After two decades of birthdays, graduations and college, the owner of a '65 AC Cobra replica shifts his attention from the kids and grandkids to his other baby. He will need the Squad's help putting some bite back into this car.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: The team repays a disabled Vietnam combat veteran for his service to his country by rebuilding his 1970 Dodge Challenger.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: The crew tries to rescue a 1949 Mercury that has been decaying in a garage for years due to its owner's myriad personal and family health problems.

programme.title: Garage Squad

programme.desc: A 1973 Super Beetle is built for Neesa, who sold her VW to pay for college.

programme.title: Ride of Your Life With Courtney Hansen
programme.desc: A 1965 GTO convertible gets rebuilt for a retired Black Aces veteran pilot from Panama City Beach, Florida; having parted with his previous GTO years ago in a divorce, gaining a new one became a daily conversation topic with his friends.

programme.title: Ride of Your Life With Courtney Hansen
programme.desc: Courtney gifts an Escalade to a mother who has suffered the unimaginable loss of two children, yet continues to stay positive, help others and give back. The team builds her a beautiful 2008 Caddy wrapped in a gorgeous black and white colorway.

programme.title: Ride of Your Life With Courtney Hansen
programme.desc: A filmmaker sells his beloved 1967 Bronco to accompany his girlfriend to Rwanda to film a documentary about the Rwandan genocide, and the team's replacement is a Godzilla-powered 1967 Bronco Roadster that was invited to be in Ford's SEMA booth.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Joe Martin is excited to see a straight '63 Impala with a four speed and legendary 409 engine under the hood; the owner wants to keep it original with the main mods under the body, new frame, suspension and big wheels.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Austin Allegro has a reputation as one of Britain's most unloved cars. Mike rescues a barn-find: can Elvis' refurb prove it doesn't deserve the label?

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: The owner of a 1969 Chevrolet Camaro has a very specific mission for Dave and the crew; the upholstery shop repairs a worn-out convertible top; body man Brandon brings his ride into the shop.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: When a local restaurant owner asks Bill to customize the '61 Cadillac he purchased at auction, the crew provides a fully customized interior, suspension, wheels and tires; an eye-catching 1963 Chevrolet C-10 gets its twin turbo engine all fired up.

programme.title: Texas Metal's Loud and Lifted
programme.desc: A 1991 Mustang is turned into a diesel race car; the Wells family restores a 1969 International Scout; Mod Mafia builds out a 1992 Chevy Silverado as a gift for a customer's wife.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill and his team of fabricators hand make a custom coffee shop on wheels, designed to match the classic look of a diesel 1931 Ford truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian gets rolling on the challenging car design.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian jumps into building the back of the car.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian takes on a new build while attempting to wrap up Victor's fantasy show car; with the two vehicles headed in opposite directions, and some fresh inspiration from Victor, Ian's got to bring the goods and steer the projects over the finish line.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: The guys determine whether a dual 2.5-inch or a single 3.0-inch exhaust system has more power; they swap pipes on a run-of-the mill 351 Ford, then they test turbo versus straight-through mufflers and Y-pipe versus a 90-degree merge.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: The guys answer the question of whether a carb spacer produces more power; the answer is yes, no and maybe, depending on the engine.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A new customer, comes into the shop with an exceptional 1963 Cadillac; this car screams luxury but needs an upgrade; with Shane giving the MBC team creative freedom on the build, Joe gets to work on a plan; new engine, new wheels and a new interior.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike spots a bargain supercar: a Maserati 4200GT for under £10k; under the hood rests a Ferrari V8, but Elvis needs to fix the potentially costly gearbox and clutch issues.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Larry visits and is excited by the advancement of his two projects, a 1948 Delahaye 135MS Cabriolet, and a custom Mercury being designed in California by renowned car builder Keith Dean.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: A 1977 Ford F-250 pickup truck evolves from barn find to beauty, and the owners arrive for the unveiling; Brad has a challenging time figuring out the starter and starter clutch in the unusual engine of an obscure 1966 Honda S600.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: The crew learns about the oil history of a town when the fire department brings a 1925 International fire truck in for restoration; Brad, a volunteer firefighter, is eager to take on the project even though he knows finding parts will be difficult.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David and Janice visit their friend and car collector Tim, who has two new McLarens with the same serial number and matching carbon fiber bodies; a 2019 McLaren Senna and a 2014 McLaren P1.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: The Guild is approached to restore a 1997 Land Rover Defender 90 as a tribute to filmmaker and environmentalist Rob Stewart; Ron struggles to install a new 427 engine into a 1969 Corvette.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: The shop overflows with muscle cars while David focuses on his new antique watch repair business; Ron starts the brakes on a 1967 Ford Mustang convertible; Johnney does final touches on a 1980 Pontiac Trans Am pace car in time for a test drive.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Brad picks up where someone else left off restoring a 1940 Ford Deluxe; owners of a 1928 Plymouth Model Q hope the crew can get it running.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David's interest in planes takes him to a local airport that houses a replica of the Avro Arrow, a 1950s delta-winged interceptor aircraft; Ron and Greg work on a new transmission for a 1967 Chevelle after the owner blew the original.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: After eight years, the 1948 Delahaye 135M Cabriolet is finally down on its wheels and heading for its first test drive, if they can figure out how to get it started; chrome plating is explored at one of the best shops in North America.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: David and Larry go car shopping to find Larry a new sporty toy; Talon, the Guild's new metal fabricator builds headers for the complete build of a Ferrari 250 GT California Spyder; David compares an iconic 1950 MG TD with a 1973 MGB.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: Brad is eager to get an antique fire truck driving down the road again, but he has hit a wall trying to find replacement gears; Greg and David go through the steps of restoring a 1930 Dodge pickup.

programme.title: Restoration Garage
programme.desc: After Tim Hapy Hipi Schmidt stops by to show off a crazy school bus renovation, David visits his garage to help take a 2019 McLaren Senna for its first drive; Ron replaces the distributor in a Volkswagen, then discovers that the brakes barely work.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: The owners of a run-down '63 Grumman bread truck want it transformed into the ultimate t-shirt vending machine; Bill and the crew drop the giant truck to the floor with custom body modifications and a bar-themed interior.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: It's 10 years since Saab last made a car, and Mike finds a soft-top 900 going cheap, but it isn't running smoothly, the clutch is iffy, the turbo lags and the steering is woolly.

programme.desc: Mike and Edd work on a 1980s BMW 325i Touring to make it road-worthy again.

programme.desc: The shop builds a gasser race car, but Dave and the client disagree on a color for the vehicle; Dave readies a 2012 pickup truck for his teenage son, who had bad luck with his first car.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: In 1988, N.W.A (O'Shea Jackson Jr., Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell) revolutionizes music and pop culture with their brutally honest depiction of life in Southern Los Angeles.

programme.title: Lucky
programme.desc: A 90-year-old atheist has outlived and out-smoked his contemporaries, and as he comes to terms with his own mortality, he searches for ever-elusive enlightenment.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Philomena
programme.desc: Journalist Martin Sixsmith (Steve Coogan) helps Philomena Lee (Judi Dench) search for her long-lost son, who was taken from her by nuns in an Irish convent and sold into adoption when she was an unwed teenager.

programme.title: Obvious Child
programme.desc: An immature, newly unemployed comic (Jenny Slate) must navigate the murky waters of adulthood after her fling with a graduate student (Jake Lacy) results in an unplanned pregnancy.

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: Rachel, a diplomatic consul, passes out on a street in Mexico City after a night of drinking. She is rescued by Alejandro, a single father whose visa she rejected the day before, and sparks fly between the two.

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck comedian's vacation plans are interrupted by her ex-boyfriend and his new girlfriend.

programme.title: Krisha
programme.desc: Tensions rise at a Thanksgiving gathering when a troubled woman (Krisha Fairchild) reunites with the extended family that she abandoned years earlier.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer (Tobey Maguire) and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) enthrall the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: When a school's goody-two-shoes (Reese Witherspoon) runs for class president, a teacher/adviser (Matthew Broderick) schemes to keep her from winning.

programme.title: Morris From America
programme.desc: A 13-year-old rapper (Markees Christmas) focused on hip-hop stardom falls for a rebellious classmate (Lina Keller) after moving from the U.S. to Germany with his widowed father (Craig Robinson).

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: A 1920s football star (George Clooney) tries to give his sagging sport a boost, while he and a new teammate (John Krasinski) vie for the affections of a feisty newswoman (Renée Zellweger).

programme.title: Line of Duty
programme.desc: FBI agents Bobby (Jeremy Ray Valdez) and Julian (Will Rothhaar) infiltrate a drug cartel run by Jason (Walter Perez) and Derek (Joseph Julian Soria), their childhood friends.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A couple (James Brolin, Margot Kidder) battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

programme.title: The Rider
programme.desc: After a riding accident leaves him unable to compete on the rodeo circuit, a young cowboy searches for a new purpose.

programme.title: The Rider
programme.desc: After a riding accident leaves him unable to compete on the rodeo circuit, a young cowboy searches for a new purpose.

programme.title: Music Within
programme.desc: After losing most of his hearing in the Vietnam War, Richard Pimentel (Ron Livingston) becomes a motivational speaker and a driving force behind the Americans With Disabilities Act.

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Fred (Michael Caine), a retired composer and conductor, vacations at a Swiss Spa with his longtime friend Mick (Harvey Keitel). As Mick crafts what may be his final screenplay, Fred is given the opportunity to perform for the Queen.

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) runs afoul of music-industry players when he teams up with a friend's widow (Uma Thurman) to produce a singer's debut album.

programme.title: Don't Let Go
programme.desc: Detective Jack Radcliff gets a shocking phone call from his recently murdered niece Ashley. Working together across time, they race to solve the crime before it can happen.

programme.title: Lucky
programme.desc: A 90-year-old atheist has outlived and out-smoked his contemporaries, and as he comes to terms with his own mortality, he searches for ever-elusive enlightenment.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: A battle of wills breaks out when a working-class woman (Amy Poehler) moves in with the high-powered executive (Tina Fey) who hired her to be a surrogate mother.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Family tensions arise after a woman (Nia Vardalos) falls in love with a man (John Corbett) who is not Greek.

programme.title: Backstabbing for Beginners
programme.desc: Based on a true story, an idealistic young employee at the U.N. investigates the grizzly murder of his predecessor -- uncovering a vast global conspiracy that may involve his own boss.

programme.title: Elizabethtown
programme.desc: In Kentucky to bury his father, a troubled man (Orlando Bloom) gets his life on track with the help of a free-spirited flight attendant (Kirsten Dunst).

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: A Navy SEAL (Bruce Willis) and his squad try to protect a doctor (Monica Bellucci) and Nigerian refugees from ruthless rebels.

programme.title: The B-Side: Elsa Dorfman's Portrait Photography
programme.desc: A profile of celebrated portrait photographer Elsa Dorfman, whose friends and subjects include Allen Ginsberg and Bob Dylan.

programme.title: Life After Beth
programme.desc: A guy (Dane DeHaan) discovers that his girlfriend (Aubrey Plaza) has returned from the dead, but his joy turns to horror as she slowly undergoes a horrible transformation.

programme.title: Missing in Action
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck comedian's vacation plans are interrupted by her ex-boyfriend and his new girlfriend.

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck comedian's vacation plans are interrupted by her ex-boyfriend and his new girlfriend.

programme.title: Philomena
programme.desc: Journalist Martin Sixsmith (Steve Coogan) helps Philomena Lee (Judi Dench) search for her long-lost son, who was taken from her by nuns in an Irish convent and sold into adoption when she was an unwed teenager.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A couple (James Brolin, Margot Kidder) battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: When the experiments of radical scientist Victor Frankenstein (James McAvoy) go too far, only Igor Strausman (Daniel Radcliffe), his equally brilliant protégé, can bring him back from the brink of madness and save him from his monstrous creation.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: Worlds collide when Enn, a shy teenager in 1970s London, meets the beautiful and rebellious Zan at a party. They set in motion the ultimate showdown between their rivaling worlds and test the limits of how far they will go for true love.

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: In 1962 London, the lifelong friendship between two teenagers (Elle Fanning, Alice Englert) dissolves after one seduces the other's father.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: A suburban Chicago couple (Donald Sutherland, Mary Tyler Moore) and their son (Timothy Hutton) are torn apart by another son's death.

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: Held captive for years in an enclosed space, a woman (Brie Larson) and her young son (Jacob Tremblay) finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A family's life in small-town Maine is shattered by the evil unleashed from an ancient American Indian burial ground.

programme.title: Pet Sematary Two
programme.desc: A teen (Edward Furlong) and his buddy take a shot-dead dog to a sacred burial ground where it comes back to life, riled.

programme.title: Children of the Corn V: Fields of Terror
programme.desc: Determined to save her estranged brother from a suicide cult, a young woman faces murderous children and worse.

programme.title: Children of the Corn 666: Isaac's Return
programme.desc: A teenager (Natalie Ramsey) searching for her birth mother is the key to a prophecy of more death and chaos for the town of Gatlin, Neb.

programme.title: Children of the Corn: Revelation
programme.desc: A pair of FBI agents follows a serial killer into a desolate Nebraskan town.

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: Rachel, a diplomatic consul, passes out on a street in Mexico City after a night of drinking. She is rescued by Alejandro, a single father whose visa she rejected the day before, and sparks fly between the two.

programme.title: Shiva Baby
programme.desc: While at a Jewish funeral service with her parents, a college student has an awkward encounter with her sugar daddy and her ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Al rojo vivo

programme.title: Hoy día
programme.desc: El show de las mañanas que ofrece más entretenimiento y diversión, con contenido positivo, útil e inspirador, pero sin dejar de lado los titulares y noticias que la comunidad hispana en Estados Unidos necesita para comenzar el día bien informada.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: La doctora Ana María Polo interviene en batallas legales que afectan a los latinos. Como en una corte, las partes presentan testigos y evidencias para que ella emita su decisión. Además, expertos contribuyen con sus conocimientos.
